attributes.action: halt the possible closure, rationalisation or reduction of services at Epsom General Hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call on the Prime Minister to ensure that the Epsom and St Helier Hospital Trust halts the possible closure or reduction of services provided at Epsom General Hospital in Surrey. The Hospital provides high quality healthcare to the local community whose needs would be greatly damaged by such closure or reduction of provision
